rules_text:
When New Tensuo Physician enters, return target card from your graveyard to your hand. If it was a land or multicolored card, you gain 5 life.
Reflect {1} [i]({1}: Create a token copy of this creature, except it's a 1/1 Wonder Elf Druid without reflect. Reflect only as a sorcery, and only once.)[/i]
